explanation: The stage direction 'Air : Ce que j'éprouve en vous voyant.' starts with 'Air', which is commonly used to indicate music or a tune in stage directions. The text following 'Air' is the name or description of the tune, which in this case is 'Ce que j'éprouve en vous voyant'. This fits the definition of Category 8 (music).
stgdir: Air : Ce que j'éprouve en vous voyant.
